title: Rockson1
author: Rockson1
content: There is awareness all around our local areas talking about crypto currency space I want to know if small and medium enterprise businesses can trade with bitcoin  in other to grow their business and assess loans for their trading in the crypto world,as a new beginner I want to know the risk involved as a enterprise owner.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Rockson1 on February 11, 2023, 08:54:52 AMThere is awareness all around our local areas talking about crypto currency space I want to know if small and medium enterprise businesses can trade with bitcoin  in other to grow their business and assess loans for their trading in the crypto world,as a new beginner I want to know the risk involved as a enterprise owner.I like to help you but I don’t understand your question. Are you asking the risk involved in accepting bitcoin as payment in one’s business? If so, then I would say in my experience, it just gives your customers different payment options whether they choose to use bitcoin to pay for your service is completely up to them. It won’t increase your profit margin or increase your number of customers IMO.
